name: Capcom Arcade Stadium Pack 2: Arcade Revolution (’89 – ’92)
name_original: Capcom Arcade Stadium Pack 2: Arcade Revolution (’89 – ’92)
description:
Play ten early arcade favorites for one low price with Capcom Arcade Stadium Pack 2: Arcade Revolution (’89 – ’92)!

Note: The games in this pack are also included in the Capcom Arcade Stadium Packs 1, 2, and 3 bundle. Please take care not to purchase content you already own.
